Check out what is going on in Greenville North Carolina this weekend

As East Carolina Universitys football season is back in full effect the city of Greenville North Carolina has plenty of entertainment lined up for travelers fans and community members PERIOD

Sept PERIOD 

Fresh Food Fridays Both the Health Science Campus Student Center and Main Campus Student Center will pass out simply prepared healthy foods along with their nutritional facts to the ECU Community PERIOD Carrots and celery will be available from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD on both campuses PERIOD

Live Music fifth Street Hardware Restaurant  Taphouse will feature live music each Friday starting at  p.m PERIOD The type of music will vary by each week PERIOD This week will feature singersongwriter Patrick Reid PERIOD

Sept PERIOD 

Volunteering opportunity The Greenville Community Garden  Orchard will host a volunteering service opportunity for community members to give back in honor of  from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Volunteers are encouraged to dress appropriately for the weather and be prepared to get a little dirty working in the garden PERIOD

One Trip Little Nash Hot Chicken will feature Americana Ameripolitan rebelfolk roots rockabilly and outlaw country music group One Trip Little for both old and new music from  to  p.m PERIOD

Sept PERIOD 

National Day of Service and Remembrance Wildwood Park is hosting a day of service to improve the park and the trails in it PERIOD Volunteers are invited to bring work gloves a water bottle wear long pants and have closedtoes shoes PERIOD The service will take place from  to  p.m PERIOD and is available to all ages PERIOD

More local events and activities can be found through the ECU events calendar as well as Greenvilles official website PERIOD
